name: part_000
file: tmp_【#おかころ2周年3Dライブ】デビューして2年になりました。みんなにありがとう！【戌神ころね⧸猫又おかゆ】 [v8tFy6_6R84]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Inugami Korone and Nekomata Okayu perform 'Hyadain no Joujou Yuujou' during their 2nd anniversary 3D live concert.

subtitles.original: じょーじょーゆーじょー ばじまじかいちょー
subtitles.english: Amazing friendship, super high spirits!

subtitles.original: なななななななな
subtitles.english: Na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na

subtitles.original: ヒャダインのじょーじょーゆーじょー はいっちゃいましょー 君はベストフレンド
subtitles.english: Hyadain's amazing friendship! Let's get into it, you're my best friend!

subtitles.original: ちょっとふざけてみたら もっとふざけ返してくれ
subtitles.english: If I mess around a bit, mess around even more back at me.

subtitles.original: なななな
subtitles.english: Na-na-na-na

subtitles.original: 居心地ったらないじゃない
subtitles.english: It's so comfortable, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 嫌なことあったって さっそ忘れてっちゃうんだ
subtitles.english: Even if something bad happens, I'll forget it right away.

subtitles.original: なななな
subtitles.english: Na-na-na-na

subtitles.original: いつだってジャンジャンやりましょう
subtitles.english: Let's always do it with a bang!

subtitles.original: 24時間一緒でも問題ない まるで双子か親子かクローンかサイボーグ
subtitles.english: Even 24 hours together is no problem. Like twins, or parent and child, or clones, or cyborgs.

subtitles.original: こんな洒落た関係 必要とかなくなってない? それとこれとは全く全く別問題
subtitles.english: This stylish relationship, is it even necessary anymore? That's a completely different matter.

subtitles.original: 喧嘩しちゃった時も かなり凹んだ時も 一人でいたいような時も
subtitles.english: Even when we fight, even when I'm really down, even when I want to be alone...

subtitles.original: ふと気付けば近くにいるしなばもろとも
subtitles.english: I suddenly realize you're nearby, sinking or swimming together.

subtitles.original: なんでだろう そばにいたいんだ 君と一緒なら 楽しさ100倍さ
subtitles.english: I wonder why? I want to be with you. If I'm with you, the fun is multiplied 100 times.

subtitles.original: 楽しいな 楽しすぎるんだ さすが最強フレンド
subtitles.english: It's fun, it's too much fun. As expected of the strongest friend.

subtitles.original: なののよ
subtitles.english: Na-no-no-yo

subtitles.original: やばいシンクロか
subtitles.english: Crazy synchronization, huh?

subtitles.original: いつもお騒がせ ご近所迷惑
subtitles.english: Always causing a ruckus, bothering the neighbors.

subtitles.original: 今何時?
subtitles.english: What time is it now?

subtitles.original: エトネヨロレイヒ!
subtitles.english: Etone yoloreihi!

subtitles.original: わけわかんないない
subtitles.english: I don't get it at all.

subtitles.original: それどーしら 想像以上なんてゆーか最高 あだこだ言ってても友達はっしょい!
subtitles.english: How's that? It's beyond imagination, like, the best! Whatever we say, friends are high-spirited!

subtitles.original: じょーじょーゆーじょー ばじまじかいちょー
subtitles.english: Amazing friendship, super high spirits!

subtitles.original: なななななななな
subtitles.english: Na-na-na-na-na-na-na-na

subtitles.original: おかころのじょーじょーゆーじょー2番をお聞きください！
subtitles.english: Please listen to the 2nd verse of OkaKoro's Amazing Friendship!

subtitles.original: 同じテレビ見て メールで実況中継
subtitles.english: Watching the same TV show, giving a live report via email.

subtitles.original: なななな
subtitles.english: Na-na-na-na

subtitles.original: ＣＭ入れば電話タイム
subtitles.english: If a commercial comes on, it's phone time.

subtitles.original: 遠くにいる時でも 近くに感じてるんだ
subtitles.english: Even when we're far apart, I feel you close by.

subtitles.original: なななな
subtitles.english: Na-na-na-na

subtitles.original: よろしくガンガン行きましょう
subtitles.english: Let's keep going with all we've got.

subtitles.original: ヤバい弁当忘れた完封して ヤバい命の源焼きそばパン
subtitles.english: Oh no, I forgot my lunch, I'm toast! Oh no, the source of life, yakisoba bread!

subtitles.original: ちょいと友達なんでしょゴムたいない それとこれとは全く全く別問題
subtitles.english: Hey, we're friends, right? Like rubber? That's a completely different matter.

subtitles.original: 変な気は使わない 顔色なんか伺わない それでも傷つけたりしない
subtitles.english: I don't use weird care, I don't look at your expression. But even so, I won't hurt you.

subtitles.original: 神様マジありがとうゲットできたマブダチ
subtitles.english: God, thank you so much, I got a true friend.

subtitles.original: やった！ おっしゃー!
subtitles.english: Yay! Alright!

subtitles.original: You are my friend!
subtitles.english: You are my friend!

subtitles.original: 最高潮 腹筋崩壊 涙出てくる 笑い疲れちゃうんだ
subtitles.english: Peak excitement, my abs are collapsing! Tears coming out, I'm tired from laughing.

subtitles.original: 何しようか 何をしましょうか 尻取りレッツゴー!
subtitles.english: What should we do? What shall we do? Shiritori, let's go!

subtitles.original: ワー!
subtitles.english: Waa!

subtitles.original: なななな
subtitles.english: Na-na-na-na

subtitles.original: 面倒だろ
subtitles.english: It's a bother, right?

subtitles.original: らぶこりに
subtitles.english: To Love-Kori

subtitles.original: なんだその生き物!
subtitles.english: What is that creature?!

subtitles.original: もう飽きた
subtitles.english: I'm bored already.

subtitles.original: マジかエトネヨロレイヒ!
subtitles.english: Really? Etone yoloreihi!

subtitles.original: 意味わかんないない
subtitles.english: It makes no sense.

subtitles.original: それどーしら ともだちとかずっと くすぐったく思ってた でもでもやっぱ言えない
subtitles.english: How's that? Thinking about "friends" and stuff for a long time was ticklish. But, but, I still can't say it...

subtitles.original: Because
subtitles.english: Because

subtitles.original: なななな
subtitles.english: Na-na-na-na

subtitles.original: はいっちゃいましょー 君はベストフレンド
subtitles.english: Let's get into it, you're my best friend!

subtitles.original: なんでだろう そばにいたいんだ 君と一緒なら 楽しさ100倍さ
subtitles.english: I wonder why? I want to be with you. If I'm with you, the fun is multiplied 100 times.

subtitles.original: 楽しいな 楽しすぎるんだ さすが最強フレンド
subtitles.english: It's fun, it's too much fun. As expected of the strongest friend.

subtitles.english: Na-no-no-yo

subtitles.original: やばいシンクロか
subtitles.english: Crazy synchronization, huh?

subtitles.original: いつもお騒がせ ご近所迷惑
subtitles.english: Always causing a ruckus, bothering the neighbors.

subtitles.english: What time is it now?

subtitles.original: エトネヨロレイヒ!
subtitles.english: Etone yoloreihi!

subtitles.original: わけわかんないない
subtitles.english: I don't get it at all.

subtitles.original: それどーしら 想像以上なんてゆーか最高 あだこだ言ってても友達はっしょい!
subtitles.english: How's that? It's beyond imagination, like, the best! Whatever we say, friends are high-spirited!

subtitles.original: じょーじょーゆーじょー ばじまじかいちょー
subtitles.english: Amazing friendship, super high spirits!

subtitles.original: ちゃちゃらちゃっちゃらー
subtitles.english: Cha-cha-ra-cha-cha-ra!
